creditline: Gift of the collection of Mari and Irving Lipton
description: concave base; rounded vessal form with wide shoulder; high domed cover; light wood tone body and cover; ring around top of bowl of medium wood tone; scattered inherent holes in vessel and cover with tiny black pointed bud-like ("stalactite") applied forms
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription and Sticker

see Si on bottom, incised: [Michael Mode / \'90-40]
title: Covered bowl
